title: Park Asks Visitors to View Bears Responsibly (NPS - National Park Service)
text: ( Source : NPS - National Park Service ) Black bear feeding in a hickory tree in Cades Cove . Photo was taken from a long distance using a telephoto lens. Warren Bielenberg . News Release Date : October 23 , 2015 Contact : Public Affairs Office ,
